title: Carrefour eSIM
description: Carrefour-branded eSIM platform providing prepaid data for travelers, with easy QR code activation and local connectivity in 100+ countries.

title: Aerow
description: BICS enabled eSIM app and web platform for travelers, offering plan purchases for 100+ countries and easy activation for roaming-free data.

title: Sixt eSIM
description: eSIM platform for SIXT car rental clients, enabling code redemption, easy installation, and activation for seamless mobile data across 34 countries.

title: Estoril Open 2024
description: Tennis app for Millennium Estoril Open 2024, featuring live scores, match schedules, player profiles and venue maps.

title: Orbister
description: Travel Web platform offering eSIM plans for 150+ destinations, with VoIP calls, city insights, and instant activation for cost-free global connectivity.

title: Orbister
description: Travel app offering eSIM plans for 150+ destinations, with VoIP calls, city insights, and instant activation for cost-free global connectivity.

title: Hertz Connect
description: Custom app ecosystem for Hertz rented Android device, offering 4G Wi-Fi hotspot, VoIP dialer, GPS navigation and city guides worldwide.

title: Sales for Gaming
description: App for gamers to find discounts on PC games via Steam, a popular digital gaming platform, covering indie and blockbuster.

title: Seat Delivery
description: In-stadium service for FC Porto fans, enabling seamless ordering of food, drinks, and merchandise directly to their seats during matches.

title: Vitaminas
description: Loyalty app for Multifood Group Vitaminas, Wok to Walk, Talho Burger, and Capri, offering shared rewards, meal customization, mobile payments, and direct kitchen updates for customers.

title: FC Porto
description: Official FC Porto app providing live match updates, squad info, ticketing, and exclusive content for fans.

title: infoCombustivel
description: Fuel app for finding the nearest and most cost-effective gas stations in Portugal, using real-time price data from the Direção Geral de Energia e Geologia.

title: GNG
description: Fashion-retail app for GNG Levis, G-Star Raw and Dockers stores, featuring fashion news and a loyalty platform with exclusive campaigns, vouchers and gifts.

title: Adventure Viking
description: Puzzle game where players help a Viking and his lady navigate through 30 levels filled with obstacles and gravity-based challenges to return to their homeland.

title: H3
description: App for H3 hamburger chain with real-time loyalty via QR codes, app-based gaming competition, and beacon-based offers & content.

title: MEO Marés Vivas 2016
description: Festival app for Marés Vivas 2015 and 2016, delivering line-ups, venue maps and Instagram-connected Instameo for Portugal top northern music event.

title: NOS Share
description: Social cloud app enabling seamless sharing of live streams, videos, photos and documents across devices (unreleased).

title: MEO SW 2016
description: Festival app for Sudoeste 2015 and 2016, offering live line-ups, alerts, livestreaming, and social features like ride-sharing, matching users and chat.

title: MEO OutJazz 2015
description: Festival app for OutJazz 2015, keeping audiences up to date with artists performing in Lisbons gardens and green spaces, map of the gardens and accessibilities.
